title: Episode 2 [Magnetic soundtrack]
creator_credit: Ray Twitchin and Bulmersche College of Education
brief_description: An example of student film-making: a night-marish dream of events amid much statuary, with passing references to Bunuel and Cocteau. No dialogue.
